net.hudup.core.parser

Class JsonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.parser.JsonUtil

  • public class JsonUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class is used to process (read, write, etc.) JSON string, JSON archive (file). JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a human-read format used for interchange between many protocols, available at http://www.json.org. In this framework, JSON is often used to represent a Java object as a text, which means that JSON text is converted into Java object and vice versa. This JsonUtil class uses the GSON library developed by Google for processing JSON format. GSON is available at https://github.com/google/gson.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
